title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as "foo.txt").
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and select Zip File to export.
4. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects created earlier, give the zip file a name (such as "test.zip"), and begin the export to zip file.

Observed Behavior:
Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails. An error message box pops up: "Problems were encountered during export," and the detail lists the file of the same name in project2 as the problem.

Expected Behavior:
The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all selected projects with their respective files, including files with the same name under different directories.

Steps to Reproduce:
Follow the steps mentioned in the description section.
